thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 133 of 3214
thread.title: Ian Fraser

author: Ian Fraser
title: Ian Fraser
text: An excellent experience - being new to international car hire I needed to use both the 'Online chat' and 'telephone help desk' both services were manned by excellent staff, who took the time to understand my concerns and to provide the information to put my mind at ease. Coupled with competitive prices and a selection of modern cars I have no issue in recommending them to the experienced and novice traveller.
